name: Briefing Workshop Template
description:
The template is aimed at ensuring that those who duplicated it could prepare as much as possible for the first global call with the entire team of stakeholders on the project.

The template contains activities, questions, and examples that will be useful in preparing for the workshop.

The information is intended for the 8-hour work of the participants.

As a result of the work, the participants will be able to get a huge amount of useful information about the project and what each stakeholder thinks. Also, this template will help agree on the work prioritization to build a single plan for everyone.
